EmailTemplate.name: 16.ComColl.SessionBC.none.D.G.E.2426.Email 8 - Mike Morris Interview
EmailTemplate.subject: Modern development models are key for future SBC design
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Migrating SBCs to the Cloud Interview with Mike Morris, SBC Chief Technology Officer
In this IMS World Forum interview, Mike Morris talks about how Nokia is adopting cloud-native and modern development models to become more responsive to our customers’ requirements, including:
- DevOps - Micro-services and containers - SDN integration Enjoy! Brendan Ziolo Head of Communications and Collaboration Marketing, Nokia Connect with us © 2017 Nokia. Contact us <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/contact]]> | Privacy policy <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/privacy]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
